info.task: navigate forwards to an image inside a banner landmark
info.title: Navigate forwards to an image inside a banner landmark in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeBanner
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the banner landmark
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the banner landmark
testPageDocument.getElementById('beforelink').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'W3C Logo' image.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'W3C Logo' image.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.
